channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon: Baptism by Fire
channel.description:
In this special Halloween episode, we're taking a look at Baptism by Fire/Forged in Steel, the classic intro scenario for Vampire: The Masquerade 1E and 2E. The Expert Delve is about rejecting irony in your elf games.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/baptism-by-fire
Enjoy!
